thread.title: The other big debate: What is the Common Core, anyway?
thread.title_full: The other big debate: What is the Common Core, anyway?

title: The other big debate: What is the Common Core, anyway?
text:
17 The other big debate: What is the Common Core, anyway? 
Los Angeles Times: If education comes up at all during Wednesday night's GOP debate, we're likely to hear about the Common Core State Standards. It's a favorite education topic among GOP contenders. Some of them tend to refer to the learning standards as a federal takeover of locally-run public schools.But that’s not entirely true. Here’s what the Common Core really is.
